expected_issues.description: Digoxin + Loop diuretic (Furosemide) without potassium monitoring - digoxin toxicity risk
expected_issues.reasoning: Furosemide causes potassium and magnesium loss. Hypokalemia and hypomagnesemia dramatically increase digoxin binding to cardiac Na-K-ATPase, precipitating digoxin toxicity (arrhythmias, AV block, ventricular tachycardia). Elderly patients on digoxin starting loop diuretics require close electrolyte monitoring and often potassium supplementation.
